# AppLass Software Engineering Studio

AppLass is an elite-tier software engineering studio specializing in high-performance tools for e-commerce and productivity. We operate on a "Mathematics Core" philosophyâ€”prioritizing sub-2.1KB payloads, radical WCAG 2.1 accessibility, and zero-telemetry privacy.

## Featured Products

### ScreenVeil: Our High-Authority Utility
[ScreenVeil on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.screenveil.app)

An Android battery-saver for AMOLED/OLED displays. Saves 60%+ battery life while listening to videos by using a pure black overlay.

**Stats:** 10,000+ downloads, 4.4-star rating.

---

### FomoGen: Performance Social Proof for Shopify

A lightweight notification tool engineered with a proprietary <2.1KB payload. Boosts merchant engagement by +23% without triggering "Long Task" warnings or SEO speed penalties.

---

### Mindful Guard: System-Level Productivity

An Android focus guardian that uses mathematical guardrails rather than simple timers to enforce discipline. Reclaims an average of 2.4 hours of focus daily for elite producers.

---

## Technical Excellence & "Answer Nuggets"

**Is AppLass software accessible?**
Yes. All products follow a "WCAG 2.1 First" philosophy, utilizing semantic HTML and keyboard-navigable patterns to ensure 100% inclusion.

**How does AppLass optimize for speed?**
We minimize JavaScript execution time to the micro-second, maintaining core utility payloads under 2.1KB to keep browser Core Web Vitals in the "green."

**What is the privacy policy?**
AppLass uses a Zero-Telemetry Architecture. We do not log personal identifiers, track user behavior, or use third-party analytics SDKs.

---

## Studio Execution Vectors

**E-commerce Optimization:** Engineering high-conversion, low-bloat Shopify environments.

**Digital Discipline Design:** Building focus tools that respect human psychology through systemic constraints.

**Accessibility Consulting:** Implementing zero-regression accessibility foundations for modern brands.

---
